content: It's with a lot of excitement and a lot of pride that Steve and I and the leadership team at Azenta have wrapped up our first fiscal quarter under the new name and under the legal structure under the banner of being able to say we have closed the transformation at this point of a milestone of becoming a stand-alone life science company, one that's producing a high-growth, high capability of value-add to our customer front with the unique portfolio that on each element of the portfolio not only have we demonstrated continuous growth, we have every expectation that every slice of it continues to grow.
